mosqito.utils

This module includes several functions currently used for sound quality analysis :

Conversion

  • amp2db()
  • bark2freq()
  • db2amp()
  • freq2bark()
  • spectrum2dBA()

Sine wave generator

  • sine_wave_generator()

Time segmentation

  • time_segmentation()

Threshold of quiet

  • LTQ()

Check compliance with ISO

  • isoclose()

Signal loading

  • load()
